name: Dino Hunting 3D - Real Army Sniper Shooting Adventure in this Deadly Dinosaur Hunt Game
name_original: Dino Hunting 3D - Real Army Sniper Shooting Adventure in this Deadly Dinosaur Hunt Game
description:
OOh No it’s huge and horrible creature of history “DINO”. It’s incredible DINOSAUR who still exist on earth.

Capt. Foster realized Dino will attack on him! Foster has only choice to down the fierce Dino with his rifle shot and finally he done it but Dino injured & run away in the dark night. Now he has only choice to get food in from hunting to survive in jungle & mountain Island but Dinosaur Hunting will be big challenge for him.

Currently he has only one rifle which can be used for hunting of Dinosaur but if he used his army shooting skills and successfully hunt some Dinosaurs, he can hunt more dangerous Dino’s and increase his level of hunting experience with help of some different high range Sniper guns like Flux, Proton, Disruptor, Ripper and Dead Bolt.

It's time to reload your sniper rifle and jump into the monsters of Island, let’s imagine yourself as a Dino hunter and enjoy to play a real time virtual hunting game. To kill a Dino, simply find it with help of long range gun scope and follow Dinosaur to take a clear head-shots!

You will see the most beautiful scenes like wildlife, forest and mountains in the game - the sounds of weapons, animals, birds and hunting of Dinosaurs.

***** GAME FEATURES *****

• First Person Shooting (FPS)
• 3D Game play & Interactive Sound Effects
• Jungle & Mountain Places for Hunting Experience
• Sniper Shooting will be Hunting Challenge
• Amazing Mission with Different Tasks
• 3D Different Landscape Locations
• Earn money to unlock 4 latest guns
• Advanced automatic guns shooting experience
• Slow motion Bullet Time Combo Effects
• Interactive Map to track your way
• Original sounds of Dinosaurs and Bullets
• High score and current scoreboard
• Small game size and Easy to download
• No internet required while playing
